content: ONE Championship combat sport events broadcast live on Amazon Prime **ONE on Prime Video** also known as **ONE Fight Night** refers to [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) events broadcast live on [Amazon Prime](/wiki/Amazon_Prime) during prime time hours in the United States and Canada. ## Background The debut event of the series featured the [ONE Flyweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Flyweight_World_Championship) rematch between current three-time champion [Adriano Moraes](/wiki/Adriano_Moraes_(fighter)) and former [UFC Flyweight Champion](/wiki/UFC_Flyweight_Championship) (also [2019 ONE Flyweight World Grand Prix Champion](/wiki/2019_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Flyweight_Grand_Prix_bracket)) [Demetrious Johnson](/wiki/Demetrious_Johnson). The pair previously fought at [ONE on TNT 1](/wiki/2021_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_on_TNT_1) in April 2021 where Moraes defeated Johnson by KO in Round 2. A [ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Bantamweight_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Nong-O Gaiyanghadao](/wiki/Nong-O_Gaiyanghadao) and [Liam Harrison](/wiki/Liam_Harrison_(kickboxer)) was the co-main event at the show. The event was to feature a semi-final of the [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Grand Prix](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Muay_Thai_Flyweight_Grand_Prix_bracket) between current [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Heavyweight_World_Championship) [Rodtang Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Rodtang_Jitmuangnon) and [Savvas Michael](/wiki/Savvas_Michael) with the winner advancing to the World Grand Prix final. However, Rodtang was forced to withdraw due to failed to provide a sample for the organizationâ€™s mandatory hydration test and was not permitted to weigh in and was replaced by [Panpayak Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Panpayak_Jitmuangnon) who scheduled against Sherzod Kabutov in preliminary card. A Flyweight Muay Thai bout between former [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Heavyweight_World_Championship) [Jonathan Haggerty](/wiki/Jonathan_Haggerty) and Amir Naseri was expected to take place at the event. However, Haggerty forced to withdraw from the contest due to a non-COVID related illness and the bout was cancelled. At the weigh-ins, two fighters missed weight for their respective bouts. [Itsuki Hirata](/wiki/Itsuki_Hirata) weighed in at 119.25 pounds, 4.25 lbs over the [Atomweight](/wiki/Atomweight) non-title fight limit. Zebaztian Kadestam weighed in at 188.5 pounds, 3.5 lbs over the [Welterweight](/wiki/Welterweight) non-title fight limit. Both bouts proceeded at catchweight. Kadestam was fined 30% of their purse, which went to their opponent Iuri Lapicus; Hirata was fined 50% of their purse, which went to their opponent Lin Heqin. ## Results Main card (Amazon Prime Video)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesFlyweight[Demetrious Johnson](/wiki/Demetrious_Johnson)def.[Adriano Moraes](/wiki/Adriano_Moraes_(fighter)) (c)KO (flying knee)43:50[a]Bantamweight Muay Thai[Nong-O Gaiyanghadao](/wiki/Nong-O_Gaiyanghadao) (c)def.[Liam Harrison](/wiki/Liam_Harrison_(kickboxer))TKO (leg kick)12:10[b]Flyweight Muay Thai[Panpayak Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Panpayak_Jitmuangnon)def.[Savvas Michael](/wiki/Savvas_Michael)KO (head kick)20:10[c]Heavyweight[Marcus Almeida](/wiki/Marcus_Almeida)def.Kirill GrishenkoSubmission (heel hook)11:04Heavyweight[Amir Aliakbari](/wiki/Amir_Aliakbari)def.Mauro CerilliTKO (elbows)24:02Lead card (YouTube/Watch ONE)Flyweight Muay Thai[Superlek Kiatmookao](/wiki/Superlek_Kiatmuu9)def.[Walter Goncalves](/wiki/Walter_Goncalves)KO (elbow)11:35[d]Catchweight (128 lbs) Muay ThaiDiandra Martindef.Amber KitchenDecision (unanimous)33:00Catchweight (119.25 lbs)[Itsuki Hirata](/wiki/Itsuki_Hirata)def.Lin HeqinDecision (unanimous)35:00[e]Catchweight (188.5 lbs)Zebaztian Kadestamdef.Iuri LapicusKO (punch)10:57[f] ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night**: **[Demetrious Johnson](/wiki/Demetrious_Johnson), [Nong-O Gaiyanghadao](/wiki/Nong-O_Gaiyanghadao), [Panpayak Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Panpayak_Jitmuangnon), [Marcus Almeida](/wiki/Marcus_Almeida)** and **[Superlek Kiatmuu9](/wiki/Superlek_Kiatmuu9)** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
